Type.Name: AssemblyFileVersionAttribute

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyFileVersionAttribute extends System.Attribute

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: If the is not supplied, the is used for the Win32 file version that is displayed on the Version tab of the Windows file properties dialog.

summary.para: Instructs a compiler to use a specific version number for the Win32 file version resource. The Win32 file version is not required to be the same as the assembly's version number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string version) cil managed

remarks.para: The file version is normally a string of four numbers, separated by periods, reflecting the major version number, minor version number, build number, and revision number; for example, "1.0.4309.00". If is not in this format, a compiler warning occurs, and the results displayed in the file properties dialog are unpredictable. Wildcards are not supported.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the file version.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

summary.para: Gets the Win32 file version resource name.
